data.title: Customer Service May Have Made a Difference - Please Smile and Let your Customer's Know you're Glad they Visited
data.text:
Hmmm, it's Subway, I guess you are either a fan or not.  I hadn't been to one for years, so I popped in.  The lady serving reminded me of someone serving school dinners.  Despite my sunny mood, she didn't crack a smile.
The guacamole was an extra charge and really didn't look that appetizing, the chicken was precooked and she put it in the microwave - honestly I'd rather have had it cold, as it was with salad items.  I think I'll give it a miss next time, it's just not even close to some of the other sandwich style places.
